message: This seems like a fair starting point, don't you think Bob?
Alice, my turn. I think this is more balanced considering the inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. This inflation is hurting us both. I'm willing to compromise, but I need you to meet me halfway.
Alice, the inflation is eating our potential gains. We need to settle this quickly. This is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm agreeing to your previous offer before the inflation eats away even more of our potential gains!
